module.name: System Dashboard
module.description: Provides a system information dashboard, showing information about Calls, CPU, Memory, Disks, Network, and processes.
module.changelog: *14.0.3.3* FREEPBX-16644 - provide compatibility with FreeBSD *14.0.3.2* FREEPBX-16654 - Exim returns nothing when no email queued *14.0.3.1* FREEPBX-16108 - remove debugging, FREEPBX-16595 - Capture stderr *14.0.3* Add mail queue stats *14.0.2.5* FREEPBX-16001 Remove debugging *14.0.2.4* FREEPBX-15092 *14.0.2.3* FREEPBX-14939 Longpoll flag *14.0.2.2* Merge from 13 *14.0.2.1* Add live network stats *14.0.1* Inital Release
